properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 10 at 2:51AM PST until January 12 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 20 to 25 feet expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm and Pt St
George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 3 AM Saturday to 3
AM PST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM this
afternoon to 3 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very large and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PST SATURDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PST SUNDAY
